```{python}
import polars as pl
from great_tables import GT, exibble
crops = pl.read_csv("data/crops.csv", null_values="NA")
harvest = (crops
    .group_by("FarmType")
    .agg(pl.col("Harvested").mean())
    .sort("Harvested"))
(
GT(harvest)
    .fmt_number(columns=["Harvested"])
    .cols_label(FarmType="Farm Type", Harvested="Harvested (kg)")
)
```
